To be religious
20 Oct 2021  
neshama  
communities  

To be religious means to have an intuitive feeling of the unity of everything (that is Ha'Shem). G-d is the name we give to this unity. And so we gather around the call of the Shma, just as the people were called by the shofar in times of old.
